summary: On the one hand Claire and Leo love each other. But on the other hand they are totally different. The two of them try to find out if their relationship will last.
cast: Julia Koschitz|Felix Hellmann|Katharina M. Schubert|Leopold Hornung|Maik Solbach|Mark-Alexander Solf|Ingrid Cannonier|André Jung|Walter Hess|Tom O'Malley
title: Der letzte schöne Herbsttag
